00042 /* ************************** INPUT FROM MOUSE *************************** */

00044 static void InputVector(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00045 {
00046     float vec[3], dvec[3];
00047     if (mi->precision) {
00048         /* calculate the main translation and the precise one separate */
00049         convertViewVec(t, dvec, (mval[0] - mi->precision_mval[0]), (mval[1] - mi->precision_mval[1]));
00050         mul_v3_fl(dvec, 0.1f);
00051         convertViewVec(t, vec, (mi->precision_mval[0] - t->imval[0]), (mi->precision_mval[1] - t->imval[1]));
00052         add_v3_v3v3(output, vec, dvec);
00053     }
00054     else {
00055         convertViewVec(t, output, (mval[0] - t->imval[0]), (mval[1] - t->imval[1]));
00056     }
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 static void InputSpring(TransInfo *UNUSED(t), MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00061 {
00062     float ratio, precise_ratio, dx, dy;
00063     if (mi->precision) {
00064         /* calculate ratio for shiftkey pos, and for total, and blend these for precision */
00065         dx = (float)(mi->center[0] - mi->precision_mval[0]);
00066         dy = (float)(mi->center[1] - mi->precision_mval[1]);
00067         ratio = (float)sqrt( dx*dx + dy*dy);
00068 
00069         dx= (float)(mi->center[0] - mval[0]);
00070         dy= (float)(mi->center[1] - mval[1]);
00071         precise_ratio = (float)sqrt( dx*dx + dy*dy);
00072 
00073         ratio = (ratio + (precise_ratio - ratio) / 10.0f) / mi->factor;
00074     }
00075     else {
00076         dx = (float)(mi->center[0] - mval[0]);
00077         dy = (float)(mi->center[1] - mval[1]);
00078         ratio = (float)sqrt( dx*dx + dy*dy) / mi->factor;
00079     }
00080 
00081     output[0] = ratio;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static void InputSpringFlip(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00085 {
00086     InputSpring(t, mi, mval, output);
00087 
00088     /* flip scale */
00089     /* values can become really big when zoomed in so use longs [#26598] */
00090     if  ((long long int)(mi->center[0] - mval[0]) * (long long int)(mi->center[0] - mi->imval[0]) +
00091          (long long int)(mi->center[1] - mval[1]) * (long long int)(mi->center[1] - mi->imval[1]) < 0)
00092      {
00093         output[0] *= -1.0f;
00094      }
00095 }
00096 
00097 static void InputTrackBall(TransInfo *UNUSED(t), MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00098 {
00099 
00100     if (mi->precision) {
00101         output[0] = ( mi->imval[1] - mi->precision_mval[1] ) + ( mi->precision_mval[1] - mval[1] ) * 0.1f;
00102         output[1] = ( mi->precision_mval[0] - mi->imval[0] ) + ( mval[0] - mi->precision_mval[0] ) * 0.1f;
00103     }
00104     else {
00105         output[0] = (float)( mi->imval[1] - mval[1] );
00106         output[1] = (float)( mval[0] - mi->imval[0] );
00107     }
00108 
00109     output[0] *= mi->factor;
00110     output[1] *= mi->factor;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void InputHorizontalRatio(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00114 {
00115     float x, pad;
00116 
00117     pad = t->ar->winx / 10;
00118 
00119     if (mi->precision) {
00120         /* deal with Shift key by adding motion / 10 to motion before shift press */
00121         x = mi->precision_mval[0] + (float)(mval[0] - mi->precision_mval[0]) / 10.0f;
00122     }
00123     else {
00124         x = mval[0];
00125     }
00126 
00127     output[0] = (x - pad) / (t->ar->winx - 2 * pad);
00128 }
00129 
00130 static void InputHorizontalAbsolute(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00131 {
00132     float vec[3];
00133 
00134     InputVector(t, mi, mval, vec);
00135     project_v3_v3v3(vec, vec, t->viewinv[0]);
00136 
00137     output[0] = dot_v3v3(t->viewinv[0], vec) * 2.0f;
00138 }
00139 
00140 static void InputVerticalRatio(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00141 {
00142     float y, pad;
00143 
00144     pad = t->ar->winy / 10;
00145 
00146     if (mi->precision) {
00147         /* deal with Shift key by adding motion / 10 to motion before shift press */
00148         y = mi->precision_mval[1] + (float)(mval[1] - mi->precision_mval[1]) / 10.0f;
00149     }
00150     else {
00151         y = mval[0];
00152     }
00153 
00154     output[0] = (y - pad) / (t->ar->winy - 2 * pad);
00155 }
00156 
00157 static void InputVerticalAbsolute(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00158 {
00159     float vec[3];
00160 
00161     InputVector(t, mi, mval, vec);
00162     project_v3_v3v3(vec, vec, t->viewinv[1]);
00163 
00164     output[0] = dot_v3v3(t->viewinv[1], vec) * 2.0f;
00165 }

00167 void setCustomPoints(TransInfo *UNUSED(t), MouseInput *mi, int start[2], int end[2])
00168 {
00169     int *data;
00170 
00171     if (mi->data == NULL) {
00172         mi->data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * 4, "custom points");
00173     }
00174     
00175     data = mi->data;
00176 
00177     data[0] = start[0];
00178     data[1] = start[1];
00179     data[2] = end[0];
00180     data[3] = end[1];
00181 }
00182 
00183 static void InputCustomRatio(TransInfo *UNUSED(t), MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00184 {
00185     double length;
00186     double distance;
00187     double dx, dy;
00188     int *data = mi->data;
00189     
00190     if (data) {
00191         dx = data[2] - data[0];
00192         dy = data[3] - data[1];
00193         
00194         length = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
00195         
00196         if (mi->precision) {
00197             /* deal with Shift key by adding motion / 10 to motion before shift press */
00198             int mdx, mdy;
00199             mdx = (mi->precision_mval[0] + (float)(mval[0] - mi->precision_mval[0]) / 10.0f) - data[2];
00200             mdy = (mi->precision_mval[1] + (float)(mval[1] - mi->precision_mval[1]) / 10.0f) - data[3];
00201 
00202             distance = (length != 0.0f)? (mdx*dx + mdy*dy) / length: 0.0f;
00203         }
00204         else {
00205             int mdx, mdy;
00206             mdx = mval[0] - data[2];
00207             mdy = mval[1] - data[3];
00208 
00209             distance = (length != 0.0f)? (mdx*dx + mdy*dy) / length: 0.0f;
00210         }
00211 
00212         output[0] = (float)((length != 0.0f)? distance / length: 0.0f);
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 static void InputAngle(TransInfo *UNUSED(t), MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00217 {
00218     double dx2 = mval[0] - mi->center[0];
00219     double dy2 = mval[1] - mi->center[1];
00220     double B = sqrt(dx2*dx2+dy2*dy2);
00221 
00222     double dx1 = mi->imval[0] - mi->center[0];
00223     double dy1 = mi->imval[1] - mi->center[1];
00224     double A = sqrt(dx1*dx1+dy1*dy1);
00225 
00226     double dx3 = mval[0] - mi->imval[0];
00227     double dy3 = mval[1] - mi->imval[1];
00228 
00229     double *angle = mi->data;
00230 
00231     /* use doubles here, to make sure a "1.0" (no rotation) doesnt become 9.999999e-01, which gives 0.02 for acos */
00232     double deler = ((dx1*dx1+dy1*dy1)+(dx2*dx2+dy2*dy2)-(dx3*dx3+dy3*dy3))
00233         / (2.0 * ((A*B)?(A*B):1.0));
00234     /* ((A*B)?(A*B):1.0) this takes care of potential divide by zero errors */
00235 
00236     float dphi;
00237 
00238     dphi = saacos((float)deler);
00239     if ( (dx1*dy2-dx2*dy1)>0.0 ) dphi= -dphi;
00240 
00241     /* If the angle is zero, because of lack of precision close to the 1.0 value in acos
00242      * approximate the angle with the opposite side of the normalized triangle
00243      * This is a good approximation here since the smallest acos value seems to be around
00244      * 0.02 degree and lower values don't even have a 0.01% error compared to the approximation
00245      */
00246     if (dphi == 0) {
00247         double dx, dy;
00248 
00249         dx2 /= A;
00250         dy2 /= A;
00251 
00252         dx1 /= B;
00253         dy1 /= B;
00254 
00255         dx = dx1 - dx2;
00256         dy = dy1 - dy2;
00257 
00258         dphi = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
00259         if ( (dx1*dy2-dx2*dy1)>0.0 ) dphi= -dphi;
00260     }
00261 
00262     if (mi->precision) {
00263         dphi = dphi/30.0f;
00264     }
00265 
00266     /* if no delta angle, don't update initial position */
00267     if (dphi != 0) {
00268         mi->imval[0] = mval[0];
00269         mi->imval[1] = mval[1];
00270     }
00271 
00272     *angle += (double)dphi;
00273 
00274     output[0] = *angle;
00275 }
00276 
00277 void initMouseInput(TransInfo *UNUSED(t), MouseInput *mi, int center[2], int mval[2])
00278 {
00279     mi->factor = 0;
00280     mi->precision = 0;
00281 
00282     mi->center[0] = center[0];
00283     mi->center[1] = center[1];
00284 
00285     mi->imval[0] = mval[0];
00286     mi->imval[1] = mval[1];
00287 
00288     mi->post = NULL;
00289 }
00290 
00291 static void calcSpringFactor(MouseInput *mi)
00292 {
00293     mi->factor = (float)sqrt(
00294         (
00295             ((float)(mi->center[1] - mi->imval[1]))*((float)(mi->center[1] - mi->imval[1]))
00296         +
00297             ((float)(mi->center[0] - mi->imval[0]))*((float)(mi->center[0] - mi->imval[0]))
00298         ) );
00299 
00300     if (mi->factor==0.0f)
00301         mi->factor= 1.0f; /* prevent Inf */
00302 }
00303 
00304 void initMouseInputMode(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, MouseInputMode mode)
00305 {
00306     /* may have been allocated previously */
00307     /* TODO, holding R-key can cause mem leak, but this causes [#28903]
00308      * disable for now. */
00309 #if 0
00310     if (mi->data) {
00311         MEM_freeN(mi->data);
00312         mi->data= NULL;
00313     }
00314 #endif
00315 
00316     switch(mode)
00317     {
00318     case INPUT_VECTOR:
00319         mi->apply = InputVector;
00320         t->helpline = HLP_NONE;
00321         break;
00322     case INPUT_SPRING:
00323         calcSpringFactor(mi);
00324         mi->apply = InputSpring;
00325         t->helpline = HLP_SPRING;
00326         break;
00327     case INPUT_SPRING_FLIP:
00328         calcSpringFactor(mi);
00329         mi->apply = InputSpringFlip;
00330         t->helpline = HLP_SPRING;
00331         break;
00332     case INPUT_ANGLE:
00333         mi->data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(double), "angle accumulator");
00334         mi->apply = InputAngle;
00335         t->helpline = HLP_ANGLE;
00336         break;
00337     case INPUT_TRACKBALL:
00338         /* factor has to become setting or so */
00339         mi->factor = 0.01f;
00340         mi->apply = InputTrackBall;
00341         t->helpline = HLP_TRACKBALL;
00342         break;
00343     case INPUT_HORIZONTAL_RATIO:
00344         mi->factor = (float)(mi->center[0] - mi->imval[0]);
00345         mi->apply = InputHorizontalRatio;
00346         t->helpline = HLP_HARROW;
00347         break;
00348     case INPUT_HORIZONTAL_ABSOLUTE:
00349         mi->apply = InputHorizontalAbsolute;
00350         t->helpline = HLP_HARROW;
00351         break;
00352     case INPUT_VERTICAL_RATIO:
00353         mi->apply = InputVerticalRatio;
00354         t->helpline = HLP_VARROW;
00355         break;
00356     case INPUT_VERTICAL_ABSOLUTE:
00357         mi->apply = InputVerticalAbsolute;
00358         t->helpline = HLP_VARROW;
00359         break;
00360     case INPUT_CUSTOM_RATIO:
00361         mi->apply = InputCustomRatio;
00362         t->helpline = HLP_NONE;
00363         break;
00364     case INPUT_NONE:
00365     default:
00366         mi->apply = NULL;
00367         break;
00368     }
00369 
00370     /* bootstrap mouse input with initial values */
00371     applyMouseInput(t, mi, mi->imval, t->values);
00372 }
00373 
00374 void setInputPostFct(MouseInput *mi, void   (*post)(struct TransInfo *, float [3]))
00375 {
00376     mi->post = post;
00377 }
00378 
00379 void applyMouseInput(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, const int mval[2], float output[3])
00380 {
00381     if (mi->apply != NULL) {
00382         mi->apply(t, mi, mval, output);
00383     }
00384 
00385     if (mi->post) {
00386         mi->post(t, output);
00387     }
00388 }
00389 
00390 int handleMouseInput(TransInfo *t, MouseInput *mi, wmEvent *event)
00391 {
00392     int redraw = TREDRAW_NOTHING;
00393 
00394     switch (event->type)
00395     {
00396     case LEFTSHIFTKEY:
00397     case RIGHTSHIFTKEY:
00398         if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
00399             t->modifiers |= MOD_PRECISION;
00400             /* shift is modifier for higher precision transform
00401              * store the mouse position where the normal movement ended */
00402             copy_v2_v2_int(mi->precision_mval, event->mval);
00403             mi->precision = 1;
00404         }
00405         else {
00406             t->modifiers &= ~MOD_PRECISION;
00407             mi->precision = 0;
00408         }
00409         redraw = TREDRAW_HARD;
00410         break;
00411     }
00412 
00413     return redraw;
00414 }
